original_text: I will restore the fortunes of Judah and the fortunes of Israel, and rebuild them as they were at first.
korean_text: 내가 유다의 포로와 이스라엘의 포로를 돌아오게 하여 그들을 처음과 같이 세울 것이며

sentences.original_text: I will restore the fortunes of Judah and the fortunes of Israel
and rebuild them as they were at first
